content: Find a comfy place to rest anytime and anywhere with help from the arm pillow. No matter where you find yourself, you’ll be able to slide your arm right through the pillow and transform your bony arm into an unbelievably plush spot to lay your head.

Stay alive when venturing into the great outdoors by studying up with the camping survival guide. This indispensable book will teach you everything from how to successfully attain sustenance to what plants can provide nourishment or potentially kill you.

Stay in shape while cooling off in paradise by getting a full body workout on the hybrid stand-up-sit-on-paddle board. This eleven foot behemoth comes outfitted with padded flat bottom foot swells that cater to your preferred style of paddling.

Technology and waffles come together in one compact and delicious package to help you make breakfast the geekiest meal of the day. With the keyboard waffle iron you’ll be able to make long, QWERTY style waffles shaped like your computer’s keyboard.

Be ready for an unexpected attack that comes your way by keeping the handy self defense aluminum cane at your side. Apart from assisting you while walking, it can easily be wielded with one or two hands, allowing you to protect yourself against a would-be attacker.

Pierce and crush through anything standing in your way using the steel war hammer. Forged out of 5150 steel and differentially heat treated for maximum destructive power, it comes fitted with an elongated wooden handle for maximum leverage.

Keep your pooch entertained for hours on end while you help rehabilitate their natural hunting instincts with the timed puzzle feeder for dogs. Apart from getting them back in touch with their primal instincts, it’ll also keep them from chewing up your possessions.

Get your offspring used to a life a luxury from an early age by letting him/her drive around in the Range Rover ride-on car. It comes fully loaded with flashy rims, tinted windows, and a realistic push-to-start ignition that’ll make them feel like they’re driving the real thing.

Keep your blood circulating while staying on top of your demanding workload by maximizing your day using the treadmill workstation. The desk provides ample space for all your belongings and features a 1.5 horsepower motor treadmill to keep you in motion as you work.

Have you ever tried doing repairs at home all by yourself? If so, you know just how difficult it can be to measure something while attempting to hold the tape as you mark down the spot. The adhesive measuring tape will finally solve this problem once and for all.

Walking is for suckers – help conserve precious energy by getting around town aboard the self balancing scooter. Capable of traversing distances of up to 12 miles on a single charge, its small size and light weight make it the perfect portable mode of transportation.

The catch of your life can come unexpectedly, so stay ready at all times  by keeping the pocket fishing rod close at hand. This pen-sized rod is made from a sturdy aluminum alloy and includes forward and reverse ratchet stop and drag control.

Keep those insufferable holiday tunes blaring all month long with the Bluetooth speaker Christmas ornament. This high-tech rechargeable ornament allows you to customize your tree with full and crisp sound quality of your favorite holiday time hits!

You’re going to need a bigger <del>boat</del> bathtub once you bust out the giant inflatable rubber ducky. This monstrous yet adorable yellow ducky stands over six feet tall when fully inflated – making it ideal for the beach or swimming pool.

Don’t get sad when your doctor says you can only have one glass of wine per day – get creative and have just one glass with this massive chalice that can hold one whole bottle of wine inside of it! It’s a must-have for alcoholics on the brink of self-destruction.

Scare away all things that go bump in the night by placing the Transformers 3D wall night light on the job. The creatively designed night light emits a cool red glow from the edges while making it appear as if the Autobots have crash landed through your wall.

Use the Force to help you ace that exam you totally forgot to study for by taking it with the Star Wars lightsaber pen. The pen comes with an eyecatching lightsaber design that actually lights up the moment the tip touches the paper.

Stay prepared for whatever the mean streets throw your way with the self defense money clip. Apart from keeping your dough neatly folded, it’s fitted with an integrated finger hole that lets you use it like brass knuckles – ideal for inflicting pain.

titleEN: Guys Can Be Cat Ladies Too Book
content: Learn the ins and outs of cohabitating with a feline from the informative “Guys Can Be Cat Ladies Too” book. This hilarious read sheds light on a multitude of cat related subjects such as how to pet them without getting mercilessly mauled by their razor sharp claws.

Create beautiful music with every step you take while walking on top of the giant piano mat. With each masterful step of your fancy patter, you can create a melodious tune to share with everyone in the room – and it also comes with 10 pre-programmed tunes.

Place an illuminating twist on telling time by sporting the always fashionable Nixon translucent watch. This eye catching beauty features a water resistant polycarbonate housing in addition to a colorful backlight that creates a stunning glowing aura at night.

Take your favorite heroes from the pages of your comics to the walls of your home by redecorating with the epic Marvel classic characters wall mural. Six of the most recognizable heroes are emblazoned in full color against a grey comic book style background.

Stay connected while cycling by outfitting your bike with this special mount case. This practical case attaches directly onto your handlebars and provides your iPhone with complete protection from the elements – allowing you to ride in any weather.

Whiz across the English Channel in record time while getting the leg workout of a lifetime with the aerodynamically designed pedal boat. The efficient design provides a comfortable seat for the captain to pedal in, with room for up to 2 passengers in the stern.

Avoid having to watch your precious headphones go into your friend’s not so clean ears by sharing your tunes with the 5 way headphone splitter. Once hooked up to your music playing device, as many as 5 people can connect and enjoy the music simultaneously.

Unlock your smartphone’s true potential by transforming it into your own mini laptop with the foldable Bluetooth keyboard. The keyboard connects with various mobile devices via Bluetooth and folds up into a compact package you can comfortably carry.

Heavyweight technology and lightweight design combine to bring you the remote control camera quadrocopter. Once behind the controls you’ll be able to fly around town while capturing amazing aerial footage from the 14 megapixel full HD 1080p camera.

Wreak havoc in your home by unleashing the plague of the 21st century on everyone using the remote control toy zombie. This horrendously fun zombie stumbles around and groans after you activate him utilizing the fun brain shaped remote control.

Keep your fine wine close at hand as you sample all the tasty hors d’oeuvres by using the wine holding party plates. Shaped like a slice of Swiss cheese, these plates are the ideal way to enjoy the food being passed around without having to find a table for your drink.

titleEN: 101 Things To Do Before You Die Book
content: Make the most of your short time on this planet by crossing off every activity found inside the “101 Things To Do Before You Die” book. After completing the book you’ll finally have some stories worth sharing, like the time you swam with sharks or went skydiving naked.

Avoid dropping screws, bolts, and nails during your next home improvement project by strapping on the magnetic wristband. It attaches to either your wrist or belt buckle and features a small magnetic surface that keeps all metallic parts close at hand.

Polaroid is relevant for the first time since the ’80s! This fun new camera allows you to instantly upload to your favorite social network sites such as Instagram, and it also lets you immediately print out your pictures so you can share them with your real life followers.

Add a festive glow to mantels, centerpieces, planters, trees, walkways and more with these stunning starry lights. The double-bulb strands offer superior sparkle, while the bendable copper wire conforms to any shape to create elegant decorative accents.

A true fan you are –  welcome the holidays you will – with the inflatable Star Wars Christmas lawn decorations. Why would you ever have some fat dude in a red suit when you can have a Jedi master dressed from head to toe in Santa’s gear holding a lightsaber?

Stay connected to the modern world as you drift off into dreamland by slumbering with the Bluetooth sleep mask. The smooth microfiber and foam gently caress your face while built in speakers allow you to take calls or listen to soothing tunes as you fall asleep.

Give your entertainment console a bit of flair by gaming with the light up Xbox controllers. Each controller comes fitted with a color coded circuit board and LED lighting system which features three distinct modes so you can customize it to your liking.

Read all night long without straining your eyes by illuminating your reading material using the LED book light. Unlike conventional lamps, the ingenious design allows you insert the light directly into the book and illuminate the page from beneath.

Use the Force to look more fashionable than ever by accessorizing with the Star Wars lighsaber earrings. Each earring is made with a small colored LEGO piece that creates the illusion you’ve got two small lightsabers hanging on your earlobes.

Cook up a chemically pure and stable pastry that performs as advertised – no adulterants, no baby formula, and especially no “chili p” – just 98% pure and 100% edible treats using the Breaking Bad cookbook. It’s time to cook, bitch!

The perfect picture is always within reach when using the universal electronic device mount. This extremely versatile mount features a spider-like design that allows you to securely position your camera virtually anywhere you need to capture the desired shot.

Give Mr. Whiskers the sophisticated look of a distinguished aristocrat with a fancy cat top hat. Each elegant top hat features a convenient head strap so the hat remains affixed and is accented with a stylish silk ribbon available in one of three vibrant colors.

The emergency tire traction mats are exactly what you need to get your car rolling when tire chains aren’t a viable option. These polypropylene mats can be used in different environments such as ice, sand, or mud and are extremely resilient.

He’s jolly, built like a mythical god, and doesn’t need red nosed reindeer to fly – he’s centaur Santa! This novelty Christmas ornament known as “Santaur” hangs on your tree, bare-chested and ready to dominate all other ornaments who question his greatness.

No electrical outlet in sight and you’re out of batteries? It’ll be no problem when you’ve got the inflatable solar lantern! This inflatable and waterproof lantern can remain lit for up to 12 hours – making it ideal for camping trips or in emergency situations.

Send your taste buds on an exotic journey when you take a bite out of the wasabi Kit Kat bar. Featuring the classic wasabi flavor without the painful kick to the mouth, this lime green chocolate bar is simply delightful and has no spiciness to it whatsoever.

Keep yourself and your feline friend entertained for hours on end with the whack-a-mole cat toy. Simply poke the blue mouse on a stick through the various holes and provide a thrilling carnival style test of reflexes for Mr. Fluffums.

Ensure you’ll be able to charge your electronic devices in virtually any country you visit using the universal wall socket adapter. This versatile device features everything you’ll need to safely power your gadgets while in a strange and foreign land.

Keep your pup warm without taking away his street cred by clothing him in a doggie zip up hoodie. The hoodie’s zippered design makes putting on and taking off the garment a breeze while the thick fleece and hood keep Fido warm and cozy.

Give the offspring a taste of the good life with the kid’s ride on Bugatti. This sporty model comfortably seats one and lives up to its luxury brand name – coming fully loaded with working turn signals, colorful running lights and a MP3 connection.

Put your time on the crapper to good use by flexing your brain muscles trying to solve the Sudoku toilet paper. Now even if you forget your precious reading material, this unscented and flushable T.P. keeps you entertained with its challenging design.

Bring authenticity and brilliance to your Christmas display with the three Wise Men gifts. These ornate, handmade chests come filled with a sample of Frankincense, Myrrh, and a blown glass globe filled with 23K gold to represent each of the historic gifts.

Get a movie theater experience in the comfort of your own home by watching your favorite flicks on the personal 3D viewer. With stunning visuals and immersive sound quality, this futuristic device is the premiere way to enjoy movies when you’re on the go.

Be prepared to whip up any drink order that comes your way when you have the ultimate bartending tool at your disposal. This alcoholic pocket knife comes equipped with ten essential tools of the trade in a convenient package you can easily transport.

Accommodate devices with electrical adapters that take up extra space by using the single outlet extension cord. This short cord fits in all standard outlets and can plug into itself so it can be easily transported without damaging the prongs.

Bring back family game night with a 21st century twist by playing with the Bluetooth dice for tablets. These easy to use dice are designed to work with an entire collection of entertaining games so you can pass the time and connect with others.

Grill up perfectly cooked meat without accidentally burning your hand in the process by using the heat shield BBQ tongs. These professional-grade tongs come with sure-grip teeth and feature an ergonomic handle equipped with a swiveling heat shield.

titleEN: So You’ve Got A Fat Pussy Book
content: Do your part in the fight against feline obesity by researching different diets in the double entendre ladden “So You’ve Got A Fat Pussy” book. This classic book comes chock-full of non-nonsensical and hilariously illustrated diets.

Satisfy your craving for the blue stuff by going on a sugar bender with the Breaking Bad crystal meth candy. Straight from the Albuquerque police evidence department is a sample of Heisenberg’s chemically pure and stable product that you can eat!

Provide your bundle of joy with a comfy place to rest his/her head without taking away precious space in your cluttered home by using the mini collapsible crib. Apart from the compact rectangular design, it features special hinges that allow you to fold it for easy storage.

Avoid your friends having to nickname you ‘four finger Freddy’ by protecting your hands with the motorcyclist armored gloves while riding. Patented exo-skeletal spines cover the vulnerable knuckles, fingers, and thumbs while giving full unrestricted movement.

Turn the holiday season into a month long bender by sampling every delicious recipe found in the “Winter Cocktails” book. Inside you’ll find more than one hundred seasonal drinks perfect for cold weather like an Irish coffee, an old-fashioned, or hot buttered rum.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Marble Track
content: Cure your boredom by watching a marble embark on a wild journey through the glow in the dark marble track designed by you. With over 300 colorful pieces at your disposal, there’s no limit to the number of complex and amusing tracks you’ll be able to create.

titleEN: Super Mario Motion Sensor Boo Lamp
content: Everyone’s favorite ghost has escaped the haunted mansion, but fear not because he’s one of the good guys now! Upon entering a dark room, the Super Mario motion sensor Boo lamp begins to shine and emits a pleasant glow that’s anything but scary.

Level up your PC with the programmable LED gaming keyboard. Multicolor per-key backlighting allows you to customize the entire keyboard with a specific color motif and features on-board memory so you can take your lighting settings with you on the go.

Treat yourself to a soothing rub whenever the mood strikes using the wireless remote control neck massager. At the push of a button you can customize massage settings while the Far Infrared Ray provides a gentle warmth that penetrates bone and muscle tissue.

Ponder the meaning of life while staying inside the lines when coloring with the existential coloring book. You’ll get a chance to bring some of our greatest thinkers to life as you color them in and complete the blank caption bubbles.

If you want to beat the rest, you have to dress like the best by accenting your look with the Pokeball belt. The design keeps your chosen Pokemon close at hand so that you can deploy their services at a moments notice should danger arise.

There’s no better way to protect your lucky power suit so that it stays in pristine condition until the big meeting than by using the super suit carrier. Trusted by all the top dawgs in the Justice League – it’s the must have suit carrier for crime fighters.

Hold one of nature’s most enchanting occurrences in the palm of your hands when you buy a bioluminescent dinosaur pet. The mixture of water, dinoflagellates, and sunlight combine to create an enchanting pale blue glow that’ll captivate the senses.

Accent your Christmas tree with the awe inspiring majesty of our solar system with these planetary ornaments. This beautiful set features nine hand blown glass sculptures – from Earth to the most distant planets in our vast solar system.

Show your loved ones you weren’t wasting your life spending countless hours assembling the perfect team when you bring home the fantasy football championship belt. Winning your league just became a lot more interesting.

Get ready to set up the greatest light display of your life by tackling the task with help from the tactical Christmas light vest. This adjustable vest comes decked out with enough pockets and clips to house all your gear so you can build your winter wonderland.

titleEN: Build Your Own Roller Coaster Straws
content: Turn the mundane task of drinking water into a thrilling ride by constructing the craziest straw imaginable using the build your own roller coaster straws. Essentially an erector set for straws, you’ll be able to engineer creations so wacky they’ll put crazy straws to shame.

A better brain is just 3 minutes away with the brainwave fitness headband. The headband – known as Muse – is a brain fitness tool that allows you to do more with your mind by helping improve productivity, motivation, and even aiding in lowering stress levels.

For those who love their burgers well done, the all black burger is sure to hit the spot. With the use of bamboo charcoal, you’ll be able to create delectable patties that look like they were burned to a crisp in the deepest and fieriest pits of hell.

Control your automobile with a single finger by using the smartphone car starter system. Once installed, you’ll be able to perform all sorts of tasks ranging from locking doors to opening the trunk and honking the horn all from the convenience of your phone.

The seasaw pool rocker toy will have the young ones hanging on while they hang out and cool off in the pool. Once aboard the rocker, the kids can either use it as a boat to float around or grab onto the handles and begin rocking away.

Start dressing like the dapper international man of mystery you always envisioned being by accenting your formal wear with the multi-tool collar stays. These titanium stays fit all types of shirt spreads and come equipped with a multitude of useful tools.

Bring your Christmas tree to life with the touch of your finger by using the app controlled string lights. The string lights feature a classic large bulb design that allows you to customize the color and lighting effects to create the perfect holiday ambiance.

Experience the dawn of a new era in gaming with the Alienware Alpha gaming console. This versatile unit provides the freedom of PC gaming with the ease of a console by letting you enjoy thousands of your favorite Steam games, movies, and TV shows.

Keep every last one of your bathing accoutrements organized and at hand by utilizing the shower curtain with pockets. The super functional design provides various compartments for you to neatly store everything you need while you cleanse yourself.

Bring some locomotion to Christmas this holiday season by placing a real moving train around your tree. This pint-size train requires no tools to assemble and runs continuously around the middle of your six to seven and half foot tree.

Art lovers can now take home one of the Renaissance’s greatest masterpieces with purchase of the Mona Lisa wall clock. Her iconic portrait graces the face of the entire clock but only appears whole when the clock strikes noon or midnight.

Keep your curious cat entertained and out of your hair by installing the fabric cat maze in your humble abode. This handmade maze mounts directly onto the wall and provides your kitty with a cool hangout spot useful for rest and/or exercise.

Learn the essential skills every guy needs to know to succeed in life from the pages of the “Manual to Manhood” book. This informative read will teach you everything from changing a tire to clearing a sink drain so you can earn your Man card.

Treat guests to a delightful afternoon of tea, crumpets, and insults with the offensive mug and tray set. This high quality set is made from ceramic and features an old fashioned design that is perfect for the passive aggressive host.

When the standard Rubik’s Cube becomes child’s play, try the 7x7x7 Rubik’s Cube instead. This monster size cube features a slew of extra rows designed to exponentially increase the difficulty and really have you flex those brain muscles.

Keep your kid locked down and stop him from running amok by tethering him to a kid’s leash. These adorable animal themed backpacks feature a leash you can conveniently control your child as you walk around town getting judged by others.

Thanks to the nose thief sweater we finally know why old Frosty was so jolly all the time. This adult themed ugly Christmas sweater keeps you cozy while keeping everyone else entertained with the hilarious antics of Frosty and his side chick snowbuddy.

Give your yard a little nighttime flair without driving up the electric bill by using the solar powered Christmas lights. These colorful and vibrant lights create an inviting and cheerful atmosphere that make them ideal for year round use.

Add to your repertoire of useless talents by mastering the Dothraki language using this instructional book. After all, once you become fluent in other equally pointless languages like Klingon and Elvish, there’s no better way to fill up the empty void in your life.

Get incredible footage by capturing the perfect shot using the flexible suction cup camera mount. The mount latches onto virtually any non-porous surface and features a versatile ball socket arm that allows you to position the camera at just the right angle.

Stay mobile as you drunkenly stagger around town with help from the hidden flask walking cane. Each cane is skillfully crafted by world renowned cane masters and houses up to 10 ounces of your favorite spirit while making you appear gentlemanly.

Fiber is really good for you. Ensure you’re meeting and far exceeding your daily requirements by making Colon Blow cereal a part of your balanced breakfast. With 30,000 times the fiber content of regular oat brand, it’s just what the doctor ordered.

Turn your snow friend from an amorphous blob into a lovable Frosty-like character using the dress a snowman kit. The kit can be used year after year and comes with everything you need to breathe life into your newly crafted snow friend.

Party like it’s 1999 and you’re gaming away in your parent’s basement when you take on the retro gaming console. All your favorite titles from yesteryear are back in one compact and versatile package that plays games from nine different systems in full HD glory.

Enjoy the finer things in life as you indulge on a mouth watering treat made using the edge only brownie pan. The long continuous chamber design allows you to easily spread the batter in a simple motion to create delicious brownies with equally chewy edges.

Get one step closer to modernizing your entire home by using the smartphone garage door remote control. With the touch of a finger you’ll be able to monitor the status of your door in addition to being able to open and close it anytime you wish.

While wearing the pet bowtie, your dog’s tail is the last thing he’ll be chasing when he hits the park. Once old Sparky strolls down the sidewalk looking dapper with his stylish bowtie, the bitches at Bark Park won’t stand a chance against his charm.

Guarantee your victory on the battlefield with the merciless  paintball machine gun. Mounted onto a battle tested tripod is a 30+ pound 8mm machine paintball gun with a custom electronic trigger that can fire in semi-auto 3 shot burst and full automatic mode.
